channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IN

item.title: Report X-2024010834
item.description:
Report X-2024010834

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-01T15:11:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05
  • City: ZIONSVILLE
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Driver brought leaking package to QA. We placed it in a hazmat bag and tote. DescribePack: Loose caps DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Tightened the caps

item.title: Report E-2024010460
item.description:
Report E-2024010460

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-22
  • City: VINCENNES
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: a pint of BPR 81156R Neutralizer released from an IBC tote due to weather when securing the totes metal frame. The release impacted the trailer floor. No Drains, Soils or Waterways were impacted.
